pages.text: The Ring of Attraction is a powerful tool. It utilises the Netherite inside of it to attract items on the ground. Tt can attract items even behind walls! But beware, as it has durability.

pages.title: Potent Enchantment
pages.text: The Ring of Attraction also has a new enchantment: Potent! This enchantment is used to make the reach of the ring further. It can also be enchanted with Unbreaking and Mending, but also cursed with Curse of Vanishing.
